Question: Molowworks SRL CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Molowworks SRL

CES 2024

- Introducing the latest 8K OLED TV with Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos support
- Features a slim bezel design for an immersive viewing experience
- Equipped with AI-enhanced picture and sound technologies for optimized performance
- Offers a seamless smart TV experience with integrated voice control and streaming services
- Includes HDMI 2.1 ports for next-gen gaming and connectivity options
